content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[MERCA]
( 
	[CodigoMerca] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[FechaInicio] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[FechaFin] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[CodigoProducto] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[CodigoProcedencia] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[Cantidad_KG] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[PrecioFrecuente] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[PrecioMaximo] [nvarchar](max)  NULL,
	[PrecioMinimo] [nvarchar](max)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
